title: Happy Hour #19: Ada Coleman and the Hanky Panky
itunes:title: Happy Hour #19: Ada Coleman and the Hanky Panky
description:
SMNTY raises a glass to mixologist Ada Coleman and her achievements while sipping on her most famous creation, the Hanky Panky. Come smash some patriarchy with us!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
